_source.text: $2.5 billion spent, no alternative cures found (Big, government-funded studies show alternative health treatments work no better than placebos.

text: $2.5 billion spent, no alternative cures **found** (Big, government-funded studies **show** alternative **health** treatments work no **better** **than** placebos.

_source.text: 2825, 162 L.Ed.2d 693 (2005) (stating it would be an "uphill battle" for a defendant to show the need for further mental health investigation when two experts had concluded he was not mentally ill); Wilson v. Sirmons, 536 F.3d 1064, 1089 (10th Cir.2008) ("[I]n many situations, the expert will know better than counsel what evidence is pertinent to mental health diagnoses and will be more equipped to determine what avenues of investigation are likely to result in fruitful information").
